item.title: Vlog YouTube Channel Growth Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a Vlog YouTube Channel Growth Specialist to help us increase our channel's visibility and grow our subscriber base. As a specialist, you will be responsible for implementing effective strategies to attract more viewers, engage them, and convert them into loyal subscribers. You should have a deep understanding of YouTube algorithms and be able to optimize video titles, descriptions, tags, and thumbnails for maximum visibility. Additionally, you should be skilled in using social media platforms to promote our videos and collaborate with other YouTubers. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of successfully growing YouTube channels and staying up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in vlogging.

Hourly Range: $7.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 06:38 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management
Skills: YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hey I am looking for someone to edit the first 28 videos of my upcoming unreal engine tutorial courses.

You will be editing unreal engine tutorial videos.

Each video is between 3- 10 minutes long

For the editing you need to do the following
1. Remove any loud background noises and make the audio clear
2. Cut any parts where I cough or make any louds noises
3. Cut out long silent pauses, sometimes I am thinking and there is a pause
4. Cut out if I make an mistakes and i redo a part.
5. You will need to add my into video which I will provide to you at the start and end of every video

The videos should be made as soon as you can although its fine if its take a bit longer, just please ensure quality is good



Budget: $80
Posted On: June 24, 2024 07:02 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Education, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Education, Explainer Video
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Content Creator for VIP-Dreams Strategic Project - Upwork
item.description:
Description:
We are a leading engineering firm from Germany, with a global presence, seeking a talented and motivated Content Creator to join our team for the VIP-Dreams strategic project. This role involves producing high-quality content that effectively communicates our project's vision and progress to a broad audience. You will work closely with our marketing and development teams to create engaging and informative content across various platforms.

Responsibilities:

Develop and produce compelling video content for primary channels including Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube.
Create supplementary content for Facebook, Pinterest, LinkedIn, and X (formerly Twitter).
Collaborate with the marketing team to create a content strategy that aligns with our project goals and target audience.
Generate ideas and produce engaging articles, case studies, and whitepapers related to the VIP-Dreams project.
Create visual content, including graphics, infographics, and videos, to enhance our online presence.
Manage and grow our social media accounts by posting regular updates, engaging with followers, and monitoring analytics.
Translate technical information into easily understandable content for non-technical audiences.
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in content creation and digital marketing to ensure our content remains relevant and innovative.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a Content Creator, Copywriter, or similar role.
Excellent writing, editing, and proofreading skills with a keen eye for detail.
Strong understanding of content marketing principles and strategies.
Proficiency in creating visual content using tools like Adobe Creative Suite, Canva, or similar software.
Familiarity with interior design and e-commerce concepts is a plus.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
A portfolio of published content demonstrating creativity and expertise.
Additional Information:

This is a freelance/contract position with the potential for long-term collaboration.
After an 8-week probationary period, a 3-year contract will be offered.
Competitive compensation based on experience and the quality of work.
Flexible working hours and the ability to work remotely.
Small teams are encouraged to apply. We provide the media plan, and you create and post the content at defined times.
Benefits:

Opportunity to work on an innovative and high-visibility project.
Collaboration with a dynamic and international team.
Freedom to bring your creative ideas to life.
Continuous learning and development in a cutting-edge industry.
How to Apply:
Please submit your resume, a cover letter detailing your relevant experience, and a portfolio of your best work. In your cover letter, explain why you are interested in this project and how your skills and experience make you a perfect fit.


Posted On: June 24, 2024 06:57 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Social Media Imagery, Art & Design, Research & Strategy
Skills: Social Media Imagery, Art & Design, Research & Strategy
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: Video / Reel Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

We are looking for a videographer / cutter that is capable of cutting reels of clips that we will provide. The content will be given by us and you can focus on cutting.

All the content is from our customer and includes the biggest and most amazing drone shows that are existing in the market at this point.

Please be aware of the fact that we need someone who ist able to deliver quick and will provide us with nicely edited, high quality content. Where sometimes some minor changes have to be made after version 1.

This project includes 4 videos of maximum of 20 seconds and is seen as a test project - after finishing this one we are planning to hire your service on a monthly base.

We are looking forward to your answer 🙏🏼

Budget: $450
Posted On: June 24, 2024 06:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: Hindi Faceless Luxury YouTube Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create a faceless video for our YouTube channel in the luxury niche. The video will be in Hindi, so proficiency in the language is a must. The video should be visually appealing and captivating to our target audience. The editor should be able to creatively edit the footage, add appropriate transitions, overlays, and background music to enhance the overall quality. Attention to detail and a good sense of timing are essential. The final video should be professional and ready for publishing. If you have experience in creating faceless videos in the luxury niche and are fluent in Hindi, we would love to hear from you.


Posted On: June 24, 2024 06:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects

item.title: New into design for my videos - Upwork
item.description:
I am a newly graduated medical doctor and I create animated video lectures on YouTube under the name "Taim Talks Med." I am looking to design a new custom intro for my upcoming clinical videos, which will focus specifically on Cardiology. I already have an intro (please see the attached video), but I would like to create one that aligns more with the Cardiology theme.

The new intro should maintain the simplicity of the current one, but feature the name "Taim Talks Cardio." I have the vector file for the avatar used in the current intro available for use.

If this is a project you can assist with, I would love to hear from you. Additionally, I am open to any creative ideas you might have for the animation.
Please add an example of intros you've created as a reference if you have any.

Thank you!

Budget: $60
Posted On: June 24, 2024 06:46 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Education, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Illustration, Video Production, Logo Design, Video Editing
Skills: Education, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Illustration, Video Production, Logo Design, Video Editing
Country: Norway

item.title: Property YouTube Channel, Editor Needed!!! - Upwork
item.description:
My client has a YouTube channel and is looking for a video editor who is able to create at least one video per month from the provided video footage, maintaining a similar style to the current videos on the channel.

Channel name - Michael Quadri

Here are the requirements for the video editing job:

- We will supply a maximum of 1 hour's worth of raw footage.
- We will have a virtual meeting to discuss the specific requirements for each video.
- You should be able to form a narrative/story from the content provided
- Use dynamic transitions & icons to keep he video engaging
- Each video should be cut down to approximately 10-15 minutes in length.
- Editing style must be similar to videos currently on the channel
- It is preferable that the videos are edited using Final Cut Pro or Adobe Premiere Pro.
- Payment of $50 - $60 will be provided for each video.

Budget: $60
Posted On: June 24, 2024 06:31 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Transition, Visual Effects, Video Cleanup, Audio Editing, 360-Degree Video Editing, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Final Cut Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Transition, Visual Effects, Video Cleanup, Audio Editing, 360-Degree Video Editing, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Final Cut Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: VFX - Paris - Upwork
item.description:
Hello Everyone !

We are looking for a talented VFX artist to create a high-quality backdrop of Paris viewed from the rooftops using a green screen.

Our actor will be positioned on one of these rooftops with the Paris skyline in the background.

Here is an example of the desired effect starting at the 54-second mark of this : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HLfAHmLzdLI.

The project will last 2 to 3 minutes, consistently featuring Paris in the background.

Only those capable of delivering top-notch image quality should apply.

item.title: Need a Video Editor For a Space / SpaceX YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a Youtube Video editor who meets the following criteria.

- Editing / Motion Graphics
- $50 - $60 per video (Highly Engaging Quality)
- Length of video: 10 Minutes (Budget will increase with longer videos)
- 1 - 2 videos per week
- Supply of paid subscription of stock footage website: Not yet known ( If not, you'll get access to a subscription)
- Example video:
1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ngACavNijMY

Edits need to be similar to or better than the video stated above!


I’d like to see samples of work you've done before.


Are you okay with the price from the description? (if not don't apply)
Did you add samples? (if not don't apply)
Do you have over 90% job success? (if not don't apply)
Do you have earned more than 100$? (if not don't apply)
Are you able to make a 1-minute sample? (if not don't apply)

item.title: Testimonials video shoot - Munich, Germany - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,
We're looking for a videographer for a testimonial shoot in - Munich, Germany.

July 9th, 2024 - 10AM local time
PLEASE READ THE PDF ATTACHED.

1 hour prep
4.5 hours video testimonial shoot + b-rolls on site

We will provide all the information you may need - name, phone number and address.

Please take a close look at the filming guideline attached.

The interviews will have to be live on ZOOM so we can hear and see everything live and able to direct also.

Equipment wise - Camera Sony A7S or better, sound recording equipment, a little bit of lights.

After shooting deliver all the material at the same day via Internet.

We think 1 person is enough for this job, we will talk and coordinate everything, you will do the interview and receive from us the questions you need to ask and what are the key answers that we need for the video.

For the testimonials - 1 Angel of shooting is enough, but shoot it in 4K so we can cut it on editing.

Thank you.

Budget: $800
Posted On: June 24, 2024 06:28 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Photography, Video Production, Cinematography, Testimonial Video
Skills: Videography, Photography, Video Production, Cinematography, Testimonial Video
Country: Israel
click to apply

item.title: Need a videographer for a small event shoot in Dubai - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:

We are seeking a highly skilled and creative videographer to capture the energy and excitement of our one-day event in Dubai. Your footage will be used to create dynamic, engaging short-form content for our social media channels.  The ideal candidate is passionate about storytelling, has a keen eye for detail, and thrives in a fast-paced environment.

Dates:

June 29th
Location: Dubai (Specific location will be provided upon hiring)

Responsibilities:

Capture High-Quality Footage: Film the event using your own professional camera equipment, ensuring crisp visuals and excellent audio quality.
Creative Vision: Bring your artistic flair to capture unique moments and perspectives that showcase the event's atmosphere and highlights.
Lighting & Sound: Utilize your expertise in lighting and sound equipment to create polished and professional footage.

Requirements:

Professional Experience: Demonstrated experience as a videographer for events or similar projects.
Equipment: Must own and provide all necessary camera equipment, including:
Camera Body: Specify preferred type DSLR or Mirrorles
Lenses: Wide-angle, zoom, and any specialized lenses you feel are essential
Lighting: Sufficient lighting for indoor or outdoor event conditions
Audio: Microphones (e.g., shotgun mic, lavalier mics) and audio recording gear
Stabilization: Tripod, gimbal, or other stabilization tools (if applicable)
Assistance: You are requested to bring additional person to assist you with the set up
Portfolio: Provide links to recent examples of your work, showcasing your skills in event videography and social media content creation.
Communication: Excellent communication and ability to collaborate effectively with our team.
Local to London: Preference given to videographers based in or near Dubai.

Deliverables:

All raw footage captured during the event

Hourly Range: $30.00-$70.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 06:18 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Camera, Photography
Skills: Videography, Camera, Photography
Country: India
click to apply
